content.question: The “malicious words” attributed to the accused best illustrate which of the following developments in England in the late seventeenth century?

choices.label: The effects of outbreak of the English Civil War
The attempt to restore Catholicism to England after the Reformation
The ongoing tensions between Parliament and the Crown over the limits of royal authority
The continuing series of military conflicts with France

content.answer: The ongoing tensions between Parliament and the Crown over the limits of royal authority

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
